uniapp.template:

  <text class="button__text">Add Item</text>
  <text class="button__icon"><view xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="2" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-linecap="round" stroke="currentColor" height="24" fill="none" class="svg"><line y2="19" y1="5" x2="12" x1="12"></line><line y2="12" y1="12" x2="19" x1="5"></line></view></text>
</button>
